1370: Salomon moved to Muurhuysen1.B.9 after marriage.
Got married to Machtilden at age 35 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Machtilden, Machtilden, at age 35.
1373: Had a son with Machtilden, Tarun, at age 38.

1378: Had a daughter with Machtilden, Aue, at age 43.
